Animation

A class that managages the sequential playback of movements assigned to overlays.

Summary
Animation
A class that managages the sequential playback of movements assigned to overlays.
Functions
Animation
Initializes the Object
apply_inline_styles
Adds the correct styles to the elements, which the class is animating.

apply_inline_styles

Animation.prototype.apply_inline_styles = function(sequence,
record)

Adds the correct styles to the elements, which the class is animating.

Parameters

sequenceAn instance of an animation sequence
recordA instance of the colllection class, which is to be animated using the sequence.

advance_frame

Animation.prototype.advance_frame = function()

advance_frame

notify_on_complete

Animation.prototype.notify_on_complete = function()

This function is called whenever the animation sequence has completed.  It is immediately called if an animation doesn’t have any transitions to iterate over.

start_transition

Animation.prototype.start_transition = function(o)

Parameters

OInstance of an AnimationSeqeunce
